name: Mood03 - ECHOES
description:
======================

MOODS is a series of short interactive experiences, a digital sketchbook for jotting down ideas and wishes, riffing on established genres or experimenting with new concepts, referencing other media and IPs or trying to establish new settings and characters. They can range from interactive fanart to momentary whimsy, from tool research and experimentation to well-defined prototypes for potential bigger projects. They're a space for trying out collaborations with minimal consequences and scope. They're made in a few days over the course of a single month.

MOODS are not games, they're windows into a scattershot creative process, aimed only at offering "stuff" to "play".

---

ECHOES is 2022 March's Mood, a continuation to February's mood to expand on the point and click system. Focused features: dual-character setup, object displacement, external script import, dynamic music.

EDIT : the dynamic music system is not correctly supported on mobile. To get the full intended experience with the dynamic music system, please prioritize the desktop version. I do NOT recommend playing the game on mobile. Thanks for your understanding.

---

Mouse controls (desktop)

  • Click anywhere to move the character
  • Click on an item (or character) to interact with the item (or the character)
  • Mouse over the eye icon to highlight interact hotspots
  • Click on the top right icon to change characters (when available)
  • When displacing an object, first click the item to displace, then the destination spot.

Touch controls (mobile)

  • Touch anywhere to move the character
  • Touch an item (or character) to interact with the item (or the character)
  • Touch the eye icon to highlight interact hotspots
  • Touch the top right icon to change characters (when available)
  • When displacing an object, first touch the item to displace, then the destination spot.
